Title: Joy Ride
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Lamar Abrams, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Open Book: Steven and Connie want a new ending to a beloved book series, so Steven takes them into Rose's Room to re-enact it. / Joy Ride: The Cool Kids help Steven put some fun back in his life.
